item.title: || How do i change client background with no sprites || PLEASE HELP ASAP :( ||
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Lol yes you can change the sprites, even without a sprite folder. You just need to look around for a cache editor, then you just need to load the cache your source uses and then you can edit your sprites.
